# yizhi-html-escape


A HTML escape character util. (>_<)


# Usage

```javascript
import {escape, unescape} from 'yizhi-html-escape'

escape('<div>Tom&Jerry</div>')
//Output:
// &lt;div&gt;Tom&amp;Jerry&lt;/div&gt;


unescape('&pi;=3.14, &yen;&cent;&pound;&copy;&reg;')
//Output：
// π=3.14, ¥¢£©®

```
